content: hinton hat is a unique crochet hat in that it is worked flat and then seamed it is a ribbed hat that is stretchy and has a thick fabric you ll love this smooshy stretchy striped hat for babies children and adults the pattern is always free on my blog at https //bananamoonstudio com/hinton-hat-a-free-side-to-side-crochet-hat-pattern/ or you can purchase an ad-free pdf here on ravelry always find my latest free patterns tutorials reviews giveaways and more at https //bananamoonstudio com happy crocheting april
